title: Defunkt - Defunkt@320
description:
Trombonist Joe Bowie&#039;s free-wheeling outfit Defunkt avoids categorization. They rip through soul, funk, free jazz, rock, and blues, and stretch the limits of each one. The atmosphere on their records is feverish; they don&#039;t do anything in an easy or simple manner. Not everything they try works, but no Defunkt album is ever dull. (AMG)


01. Make Them Dance                                              
02. Strangling Me With Your Love                                 
03. In The Good Times                                            
04. Blues                                                        
05. Defunkt                                                      
06. Thermonuclear Sweat                                          
07. Melvin&#039;s Tune                                                
08. We All Dance Together
